translations: （小口地）喝，呷；<旧>吃晚餐（sup 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: Supping on cold potatoes was never very satisfying.
sentences.translation: 用餐迟了吃冷土豆总是不令人满意的。

sentences.sentence: All this will mean supping with less-than-savoury figures.
sentences.translation: 这一切意味着要亲近那些不太让人愉快的人物。

sentences.sentence: How many spirited young men and pretty women ate in the morning with their family and friends, and by evening were supping with their forefathers.
sentences.translation: 多少俊男靓女早上还和家人朋友共进早餐，晚上却已经在和他们的祖先一起用晚餐了。
